items.sentence: Tom wondered if Mary would think that eight in the morning was too early for him to open a bottle of wine.
If you\'d told me about it earlier, I could\'ve been free. However, tomorrow I have plans to go back home.
Tom\'s daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.
We were unsure what kind of person Tom would be and whether he would like to live in the same house as us.
Tom died at the scene of the accident. Mary and her father were seriously injured and are in the hospital.
